answers.answer: Not at all. Your body was just telling you it needed water. :)

Being extremely thirsty is a sign of diabetes. You could just be dehydrated but if it continues I would talk to your doctor and they will probably have you do your glucose test early (if you haven't already)
Well I'm only 13 weeks and 5 days

Drinking large amounts of water as such is a sign of diabetes. I would keep an eye on this and if it continues inform your doctor so they can check for you and your babies safety. It's preventable if caught early!

question: Just drank 4 tall glasses of water in the past 30 minutes anyone know if that's bad ?
title: Feel so thirsty
